message.body: Lol, it's sign that it was sold out! I didn't even look. I'm in a secret Santa this year, so I just bought the one present.
Secret Santa is so fun! My family use to do it when I was little and I would try to figure it out each year.
So are you done Christmas shopping then?
Oh you're one of those people!
Nah, will probably have to buy for my family. The secret Santa is for friends.
Yes I am :) I'm impatient, is it really that surprising? Hahah.
Gotcha. That makes sense. Whoa, I just realized that the last time I did Secret Santa was with you Freshmen year!
Lol. I don't even remember that anymore...
It was with Sarah, Dan, Kayleigh. I got you!
What did you get me again? Lol
It was an oversized universal remote. Obviously, it was quite memorable.
Oh yeah!!! How could I forget that... Lol.
